ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT( OR( ISBLANK( MobilePhone ),
AND( BEGINS(MobilePhone, "+"), NOT(BEGINS(MobilePhone, "+0")), REGEX(MobilePhone, "^\\+?[1-9]{1}[0-9]*$") ),
AND( OR( BEGINS(MobilePhone, "080"), BEGINS(MobilePhone, "090") ), OR( LEN(MobilePhone) = 8, LEN(MobilePhone) = 11 ), NOT(LEN(MobilePhone) = 10) ),
AND( BEGINS(MobilePhone, "044"), LEN(MobilePhone) >= 6, LEN(MobilePhone) <= 14 ),
AND( BEGINS(MobilePhone, "0"), NOT( OR( BEGINS(MobilePhone, "080"), BEGINS(MobilePhone, "090"), BEGINS(MobilePhone, "044") ) ), LEN(MobilePhone) = 10 ),
AND( BEGINS(MobilePhone, "1"), OR( LEN(MobilePhone) = 3, LEN(MobilePhone) = 4, LEN(MobilePhone) = 5, LEN(MobilePhone) = 6 ) ),
REGEX(MobilePhone, "^[2-9]{1}[0-9]{2}[\\s.-]?[0-9]{3}[\\s.-]?[0-9]{4}$") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Check if the mobile number is in correct order.
